parameters.name: ContactIds
parameters.description: The ID of the alert contact that you want to query. Separate multiple contact IDs with spaces.

parameters.name: ContactName
parameters.description: The name of the alert contact.

parameters.name: Email
parameters.description: The email address of the alert contact.

parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: Phone
parameters.description: The mobile number of the alert contact.

parameters.name: Size
parameters.description: The number of alert contacts to return on each page.

parameters.name: Verbose
parameters.description: Specifies whether to return redundant information.
